quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss
bio: Theodor Seuss Geisel was an American writer, cartoonist, animator, book publisher, and artist best known for authoring children's books under the pen name Dr. Seuss.

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde
bio: Oscar Fingal O'Flahertie Wills Wilde was an Irish playwright, novelist, essayist, and poet.

quote: So many books, so little time.
author: Frank Zappa
bio: Frank Zappa was an American musician, composer, songwriter, producer, guitarist, actor, and filmmaker whose work was characterized by nonconformity, free-form improvisation, sound experiments, musical virtuosity, and satire of American culture.

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi
bio: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi was the preeminent leader of the Indian independence movement in British-ruled India.

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt
bio: Anna Eleanor Roosevelt was an American politician, diplomat, and activist. She was the longest-serving First Lady of the United States.

quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
author: Elbert Hubbard
bio: Elbert Green Hubbard was an American writer, publisher, artist, and philosopher.

quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche
bio: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche was a German philosopher, cultural critic, poet, philologist, and Latin and Greek scholar.

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Stephen Chbosky
bio: Stephen Chbosky is an American novelist, screenwriter, and film director.
